mapper.select: SELECT A.FLD01 FLDH,A.FLD09 PFDFLI02,(B.FLDI03+B.FLDI06-B.FLDI05)KYFL, B.FLFS01,GET_DJLX(A.FLD09) DJLX,A.KPBJ, B.FLDM01,(SELECT FLDM02 FROM FLDM WHERE FLDM01=B.FLDM01)FLMC,0 SYFL FROM FLD A,FLDITEM B WHERE A.GSXX01=B.GSXX01 AND A.FLD01=B.FLD01 AND A.FLD16 IS NULL AND A.FLD06 IS NOT NULL AND (B.FLDI03+B.FLDI06-B.FLDI05)>0 AND A.GSXX01=#{GSXX01} AND A.WLDW01=#{WLDW01} AND A.BM01=#{BM01}
SELECT XSWD01,XSWD02 XSWDMC FROM XSWD WHERE XSWD17 = 1

SELECT B.WBTDH,A.GSXX01,A.JLWBDH FXDH,A.FHDH,A.PFD01,D.DJLX DJLX01,A.PFD45 SHDZ, B.PFDI20 FPHM,TO_CHAR(B.PFDI50,'YYYY-MM-DD')FPRQ,
K.JLWBDH KHYHDH, S.SPXX02 SPBM, S.SPXX04 SPMC, S.SPFL01 SPFL01, (CASE WHEN B.PFDI15=0 THEN '0' WHEN B.PFDI15 <>0 THEN (B.PFDI15 * 100) || '%' END) KD, ROUND(B.PFDI02,2) FXDJ, B.PFDI05 FXSL, ROUND((B.PFDI06+B.PFDI07),2) FXJE, ROUND(B.PFDI06, 2) SSJE, B.KHBZJG, ROUND((1 + W.JXSL01) * B.PFDI08, 2) FXCB, CASE WHEN A.PFD05 IS NOT NULL THEN ROUND(B.PFDI06 - PFDI08 * (1 + W.JXSL01), 2) ELSE 0 END ML, ROUND(B.PFDI13, 2) SJ, get_spsx_v10(B.PFDI21) SPSX, S.JLDW01 JLDW, A.WLDW01 KHBM, (SELECT WLDW02 FROM WLDW WHERE WLDW01 = A.WLDW01) KHMC, W.WLDW04 KHJC, (SELECT FLFS02 FROM FLFS WHERE FLFS01 = A.FLFS01) XSFS, (SELECT BM02 FROM BM WHERE BM01 = A.BM01) XSBM, A.PFD06 YYY01, A.PFD20 SKR, TO_CHAR(A.PFD05, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SKRQ, A.PFD19 YYY, B.PFDI12 FHR, TO_CHAR(B.PFDI11, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FHRQ, (SELECT CK02 FROM CK WHERE CK01 = B.CK01) CKMC, (SELECT BM02 FROM BM WHERE BM01 = B.BM01) CGBM, A.PFD11 BZ, A.GCMC, (SELECT PPB02 FROM PPB WHERE PPB01 = S.PPB01) PPMC, S.SPFL02 SPFLMC, (SELECT XSWD02 FROM XSWD WHERE XSWD01 = B.XSWD01) XSWDMC, A.PFD29 SHR, TO_CHAR(A.PFD30, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SHRQ, TO_CHAR(A.PFD51, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CWRQ, A.PFD07 ZDR, TO_CHAR(A.PFD32,'YYYY-MM-DD') XSRQ, B.PFDI07 FLJE, TO_CHAR(A.PFD04, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ZDRQ, B.PFDI12 FHR, TO_CHAR(B.PFDI11, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FHRQ, W.KSLX01, (SELECT KSLX02 FROM KSLX WHERE KSLX01 = W.KSLX01) KSLXMC, (CASE WHEN NVL(D.SSFSL,0) = 0 AND NVL(D.THSL,0) = 0 AND NVL(D.ZFSL,0) = 0 AND NVL(D.JSSL,0) = 0 THEN '未发货' WHEN ABS(D.YSFSL - D.SSFSL - D.ZFSL - D.JSSL) > 0 AND D.SSFSL <> 0 THEN '部分发货' WHEN ABS(D.YSFSL - D.SSFSL - D.ZFSL - D.JSSL) = 0 AND D.SSFSL <> 0 THEN '全部发货' WHEN NVL(D.SSFSL,0) = 0 AND (D.THSL>0) AND D.YSFSL - D.THSL <> 0 THEN '部分退货' WHEN NVL(D.SSFSL,0) = 0 AND (D.THSL>0) AND D.YSFSL - D.THSL = 0 THEN '全部退货' END) FHZT, A.HDZT01, (SELECT HDZTMC FROM HDZT WHERE HDZT01=A.HDZT01 AND GSXX01=A.GSXX01 ) HDZTMC, W.WBBM CJDM, DECODE(A.PFD46,0,'自提',1,'配送',2,'配送') PSLX, S.SPXX68 TJ,TO_CHAR(B.PFDI11, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FHRQ, (SELECT FPDC03 FROM FPDCB,FPDCITEM WHERE FPDCB.FPDC01=FPDCITEM.FPDC01 AND FPDCB.GSXX01=FPDCITEM.GSXX01 AND SKI01=B.PFDI01 AND FPDCITEM.GSXX01=B.GSXX01 AND FPDC20 IS NULL AND FPDC33 IS NOT NULL AND FPDCB.DJZT IN (1,2,3) AND FPDCITEM.DJLX=8 AND ROWNUM=1) KPHM, TO_CHAR((SELECT FPDC23 FROM FPDCB,FPDCITEM WHERE FPDCB.FPDC01=FPDCITEM.FPDC01 AND FPDCB.GSXX01=FPDCITEM.GSXX01 AND SKI01=B.PFDI01 AND FPDCITEM.GSXX01=B.GSXX01 AND FPDC20 IS NULL AND FPDC33 IS NOT NULL AND FPDCB.DJZT IN (1,2,3) AND FPDCITEM.DJLX=8 AND ROWNUM=1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') KPSJ , TO_CHAR(A.JHRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD') JHRQ, (SELECT SUM(FPDCI04) FROM FPDCB, FPDCITEM WHERE FPDCB.FPDC01 = FPDCITEM.FPDC01 AND FPDCB.GSXX01 = FPDCITEM.GSXX01 AND SKI01 = B.PFDI01 AND FPDC20 IS NULL AND FPDCB.DJZT IN (1,2,3) AND FPDC33 IS NOT NULL AND FPDCITEM.GSXX01 = B.GSXX01 AND DJLX=8) KPJE, (SELECT TO_CHAR(YYSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM CSS_FWDITEM WHERE DJLX=8 AND DJTDH=B.WBTDH AND ROWNUM=1) YYSJ, B.LXRMX,B.LXDHMX FROM PFD A, PFDITEM B, SPXX S, WLDW W, DSFHPSB D,KHYHD_NEW K WHERE A.PFD01 = B.PFD01 AND A.WLDW01 = W.WLDW01 AND A.GSXX01 = B.GSXX01 AND B.SPXX01 = S.SPXX01 AND 8=D.DJLX(+)
AND B.GSXX01 = D.GSXX01(+) AND B.PFD01 = D.DJHM(+) AND B.PFDI01 = D.THDH(+) AND A.GSXX01=K.GSXX01(+) AND A.KHYHD01=K.KHYHD01(+) JL{CZY|A.GSXX01|CZGS_CX|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|A.BM01|BM_CX|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|B.BM01|BM_CX|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|B.CK01|CK_CX|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|S.PPB01|PPB_CX|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|S.SPFL01|SPFL_CX|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|A.WLDW01|WLDW_CX|inS}JL
AND B.PFDI50 IS NOT NULL
AND B.PFDI50 IS NULL
AND A.GSXX01=#{GSXX01}
AND A.PFD07 LIKE '%'||#{ZDRMC}||'%'
AND A.PFD46=#{PSLX}
AND A.FHDH LIKE '%'||#{FHDH}||'%'
AND K.JLWBDH LIKE '%'||#{KHYHDH}||'%'
AND A.HDZT01=#{HDZT}
AND A.PFD11 LIKE '%'||#{BZ}||'%'
AND A.PFD07 IS NOT NULL AND A.PFD04 IS NOT NULL AND A.PFD29 IS NULL AND A.PFD30 IS NULL
AND A.PFD07 IS NOT NULL AND A.PFD04 IS NOT NULL AND A.PFD29 IS NOT NULL AND A.PFD30 IS NOT NULL
AND W.KSLX01=#{KSLX}
AND B.PFDI12 IS NULL AND D.SSFSL=0 AND D.CZLX = 1
AND ABS(D.YSFSL-D.SSFSL)>0 AND D.SSFSL>0 AND D.CZLX=1
AND ABS(D.YSFSL-D.SSFSL)=0 AND D.CZLX = 1
AND A.JLWBDH LIKE '%'||#{FXDH}||'%'
Upper(S.SPXX02) LIKE Upper('%'||#{item}||'%') OR Upper(S.SPXX04) LIKE Upper('%'||#{item}||'%') OR Upper(S.SPPYM) LIKE Upper('%'||#{item}||'%')
A.BM01 LIKE #{item}||'%'
B.BM01 LIKE #{item}||'%'
B.XSWD01 = #{item}
AND (W.WLDW02 LIKE '%'||#{WLDW}||'%' OR A.WLDW01 LIKE '%'||#{WLDW}||'%')
B.CK01 LIKE #{item}||'%'
S.PPB01 LIKE #{item}||'%'
A.PFD06 = #{item}
S.SPFL01 LIKE #{item}||'%'
B.PFDI21 = #{item}
A.FLFS01 = #{item}
AND A.JHRQ = TO_DATE(#{JHRQ},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.PFD04 >= TO_DATE(#{ZDRQ_S},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND A.PFD04 <= TO_DATE(#{ZDRQ_E},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND A.PFD05 >= TO_DATE(#{SKRQ_S},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.PFD05 <= TO_DATE(#{SKRQ_E},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND B.PFDI11 >= TO_DATE(#{FHRQ_S},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND B.PFDI11 <= TO_DATE(#{FHRQ_E},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.PFD32 >= TO_DATE(#{XSRQ_S},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.PFD32 <= TO_DATE(#{XSRQ_E},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.PFD51 >= TO_DATE(#{DJRQ_S},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.PFD51 <= TO_DATE(#{DJRQ_E},'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY A.JLWBDH

SELECT DISTINCT A.SFZH SFZH01, A.YWYDM YWY_RYXX01, TO_CHAR( A.ZDRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD') ZDRQ, A.HDZT01,A.BZ, (SELECT HDZTMC FROM HDZT WHERE A.HDZT01 =HDZT01) HDZTMC , (SELECT RYXX02 FROM RYXX WHERE RYXX01 = A.YWYDM) YWYMC, A.BM01 XS_BM01, (SELECT BM02 FROM BM WHERE BM.BM01 = A.BM01 AND BM.GSXX01 = A.GSXX01) XSBMMC, A.FLFS01 XSFS01, (SELECT FLFS02 FROM FLFS WHERE FLFS.FLFS01 = A.FLFS01) XSFS02, A.WLDW01 KH_WLDW01, W.WLDW02 KHMC, W.WLDW65 SKBJ, W.WLDW46 JGGK, W.WLDW10 LXDH, A.JLWBDH,A.DSBJ, A.KHYHD01 FROM KHYHD_NEW A, KHYHDitem_NEW B,WLDW W WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.WLDW01 = W.WLDW01 AND A.SHR IS NOT NULL AND A.KHYHD01=B.KHYHD01 AND A.GSXX01 = B.GSXX01 AND A.JLWBDH LIKE 'XH%' AND (B.YHSL-B.XSSL-B.ZZSL)>0
AND A.GSXX01 = #{GSXX01}
AND A.JLWBDH LIKE '%'||#{KHYHDH}||'%'
AND A.FLFS01 = #{FLFS}
AND ( A.WLDW01 LIKE '%'||#{KH}||'%' OR W.WLDW02 LIKE '%'||#{KH}||'%' OR W.WLDW03 LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{KH})||'%')
AND A.ZDRQ >= TO_DATE(#{ZDSJQ},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.ZDRQ <= TO_DATE(#{ZDSJZ},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM PFD WHERE PFD.GSXX01=A.GSXX01 AND PFD.GCDJH = A.KHYHD01)

SELECT A.SKFS01,A.SKFS02,A.SKFS06 ,A.SKFS16 YHBJ FROM SKFS A, QXSKFSITEM B,CZY C WHERE A.SKFS01 = B.SKFS01 AND B.QXSKFS01 = C.CZY05 AND A.SKFS03 = 1 And A.SKFS05 = 1 AND A.SKFS06 NOT IN (9,19,17,16,27) AND C.CZY01 = #{CZY01} ORDER BY B.QXSKFSI01

SELECT B.SPXX01, (SELECT SPXX02 FROM SPXX WHERE SPXX01 = B.SPXX01) SPBM, (SELECT SPXX04 FROM SPXX WHERE SPXX01 = B.SPXX01) SPMC, (SELECT GGB01 FROM SPXX WHERE SPXX01 = B.SPXX01) SPGG, (SELECT JLDW01 FROM SPXX WHERE SPXX01 = B.SPXX01) JLDW, A.ZHSP01, B.ZHSPI01 LSDJ, B.ZHSPI07 ZHDJ, B.ZHSPI02 ZHSL, B.ZHSPI03, B.ZHSPI04, C.CK01, (SELECT CK02 FROM CK WHERE CK01=C.CK01) CKMC, C.BM01 CGBM01, (SELECT BM02 FROM BM WHERE BM01=C.BM01) CGBMMC, B.ZHSPI05 SPSX, B.ZHSPI06, B.WLDW01 WLDW01, (SELECT WLDW02 FROM WLDW WHERE WLDW01 = B.WLDW01) WLDWMC, B.ZHSPI07, B.ZHSPI08, B.ZHSPI10, C.CKSP12 SPSX, D.SPJG08 LSXJ, get_spsx_v10(B.ZHSPI05) SPSXMC, 0 ZHBJ, '普通' JGLX, C.CKSP04 KMS, C.CKSP13 FMBJ, B.ZHSPI10 ZBBJ FROM ZHSP A, ZHSPITEM B, CKSP C,SPJGB D WHERE A.ZHSP01 = B.ZHSP01 AND A.GSXX01 = B.GSXX01 AND A.GSXX01 = B.GSXX01 AND A.GSXX01 = C.GSXX01 AND B.WLDW01 = C.WLDW01 AND B.SPXX01 = C.SPXX01 AND ((C.CKSP13 = 0 AND C.CKSP04 > 0) OR (C.CKSP13 = 1)) AND C.SPXX01=D.SPXX01 AND C.GSXX01=D.GSXX01 AND C.WLDW01=D.WLDW01 AND C.BM01=D.BM01
AND A.GSXX01 = #{GSXX01}
AND A.ZHSP01 LIKE '%'||#{ZHSP01}||'%'
JL{CZY|A.BM01|BM_CZ|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|A.WLDW01|CK_WLDW|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|A.GSXX01|CZGS_CZ|LIKE%}JL

SELECT DISTINCT A.JLWBDH JHDH, A.JHD01, A.WLDW01 KH01, (SELECT WLDW02 FROM WLDW WHERE A.WLDW01 = WLDW01) KHMC, A.CK01, (SELECT CK02 FROM CK WHERE CK01 = A.CK01) CKMC, A.BM01 XS_BM01, (SELECT BM02 FROM BM WHERE BM01 = A.BM01) BMMC, A.FHDH, TO_CHAR(A.JHD02, 'YYYY-MM-DD') JCRQ, A.JHD06 BZ FROM JHD A, JHDITEM B WHERE A.JHD01 = B.JHD01 AND A.GSXX01 = B.GSXX01 AND NVL((SELECT E.SSFSL FROM DSFHPSB E WHERE E.CZLX = 1 AND B.JHD01 = E.DJHM AND E.DJLX = 51 AND E.THDH = B.JHDI01 AND E.GSXX01 = A.GSXX01), 0) > 0 AND (NVL((SELECT E.SSFSL FROM DSFHPSB E WHERE E.CZLX = 1 AND B.JHD01 = E.DJHM AND E.DJLX = 51 AND E.THDH = B.JHDI01 AND E.GSXX01 = A.GSXX01), 0)) - (SELECT SUM(E.THSL) FROM DSFHPSB E WHERE E.CZLX = 1 AND B.JHD01 = E.DJHM AND E.DJLX = 51 AND E.THDH = B.JHDI01 AND E.GSXX01 = A.GSXX01) > 0 AND A.WLDW01 IS NULL
AND A.GSXX01 = #{GSXX01}
AND A.JLWBDH LIKE '%'||#{JHDH}||'%'
A.CK01 LIKE #{item} || '%'
AND (REGEXP_LIKE(A.WLDW01, #{KH}, 'i') OR REGEXP_LIKE((SELECT WLDW02 FROM WLDW WHERE WLDW01=A.WLDW01), #{KH}, 'i') )
A.BM01 LIKE #{item} || '%'
AND A.JHD02 >= TO_DATE(#{JCRQQ},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.JHD02 <= TO_DATE(#{JCRQZ},'YYYY-MM-DD')
JL{CZY|A.BM01|BM_CZ|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|A.GSXX01|CZGS_CZ|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|A.CK01|CK_CZ|LIKE%}JL UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT A.JLWBDH JHDH, A.JHD01, A.WLDW01 KH01, (SELECT WLDW02 FROM WLDW WHERE A.WLDW01 = WLDW01) KHMC, A.CK01, (SELECT CK02 FROM CK WHERE CK01 = A.CK01) CKMC, A.BM01 XS_BM01, (SELECT BM02 FROM BM WHERE BM01 = A.BM01) BMMC, A.FHDH, TO_CHAR(A.JHD02, 'YYYY-MM-DD') JCRQ, A.JHD06 BZ FROM JHD A, JHDITEM B WHERE A.JHD01 = B.JHD01 AND A.GSXX01 = B.GSXX01 AND NVL((SELECT E.SSFSL FROM DSFHPSB E WHERE E.CZLX = 1 AND B.JHD01 = E.DJHM AND E.DJLX = 51 AND E.THDH = B.JHDI01 AND E.GSXX01 = A.GSXX01), 0) > 0 AND (NVL((SELECT E.SSFSL FROM DSFHPSB E WHERE E.CZLX = 1 AND B.JHD01 = E.DJHM AND E.DJLX = 51 AND E.THDH = B.JHDI01 AND E.GSXX01 = A.GSXX01), 0)) - (SELECT SUM(E.THSL) FROM DSFHPSB E WHERE E.CZLX = 1 AND B.JHD01 = E.DJHM AND E.DJLX = 51 AND E.THDH = B.JHDI01 AND E.GSXX01 = A.GSXX01) > 0 AND A.WLDW01 IS NOT NULL
AND A.GSXX01 = #{GSXX01}
AND A.JLWBDH = #{JHDH}
A.CK01 LIKE #{item} || '%'
AND A.WLDW01 = #{WLDW01}
AND (REGEXP_LIKE(A.WLDW01, #{KH}, 'i') OR REGEXP_LIKE((SELECT WLDW02 FROM WLDW WHERE WLDW01=A.WLDW01), #{KH}, 'i') )
A.BM01 LIKE #{item} || '%'
AND A.JHD02 >= TO_DATE(#{JCRQQ},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.JHD02 <= TO_DATE(#{JCRQZ},'YYYY-MM-DD')
JL{CZY|A.WLDW01|KH_CZ|inS}JL JL{CZY|A.BM01|BM_CZ|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|A.GSXX01|CZGS_CZ|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|A.CK01|CK_CZ|LIKE%}JL
